means: 宽松地，容量大地，篇幅长地

sentence.Network_en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentence.Network_cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentence.Network_en: I sank down into a voluminous armchair.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一下子坐在了宽大的扶手椅里。

sentence.Network_en: She tucked up her voluminous skirts to make room for Jane beside her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她掖起膨松的裙边给旁边的简腾出地方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: voluminosity 庞大voluminous 很多的volumometer 容积计
在线字典：浩字的含义、浩字... ... 浩气[ noble spirit] 浩如烟海[ voluminous;be vast as the open sea] (2) 同本义[ onrushing].
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... voluble 健谈的；易旋转的 voluminous 长篇的；多产的 voracious 狼吞虎咽的，贪婪的.
蓝宝词典 ... voluble adj. 健谈的，流利的 voluminous adj. 卷数多的,大量的,庞大的 votary n. 热心者,崇拜者,信徒.

voluminous中文 ... voluminous 很多的 voluminously 庞大地 ... volume 书册,书本,体积,大量,多量.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: partly from late Latin voluminosus 'having many coils', partly from Latin volumen, volumin- (see volume)

entry.tran: 庞大的;浩繁的;大部头的
entry.def: Something that is voluminous is very large or contains a lot of things.

example.ex: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
example.tran: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

means.word_mean: 2. large in number or quantity (especially of discourse);

auth_sentence.content: The most ardent and voluminous advocate of women's liberation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The most ardent and voluminous advocate of women's liberation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The most ardent and voluminous advocate of women's liberation.

auth_sentence.content: Her hair, which was still voluminous, had turned translucent white.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her hair, which was still voluminous, had turned translucent white.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, the better, more voluminous genus-level data subsequently confirmed the prediction.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, the better, more voluminous genus-level data subsequently confirmed the prediction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, the better, more voluminous genus-level data subsequently confirmed the prediction.

evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的
re回,翻+volu转,卷+tion表名词→转翻→革命
volu转,卷+me→卷→一卷书[古时的书籍成卷形]
volu转,卷+te→n. 涡形;螺旋形;涡螺壳
